value.title: Using Custom Format Strings in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for. value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?

This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube
